original_title: Kick Ass Chicks 42: Big Black Titties
overview: Dem's Big Titties, Bro!  Niggas be talkin' 'bout sisters havin' big booties 'n shit. But listen y'all, they also got some big phat titties. Ya feel me tho? Talkin' 'bout big ol' handfuls of chocolate milk. The way they hang when I'm fuckin' a bitch doggy-style, swingin' all over the place and knockin' against each other. Or the way they look when a ho be riding me, and I looks up and see 'em bouncin' around like some big ol' hippity hops. (Yeah, we had hippity hops in the ghetto motherfucker!) But check dis, no matter what your favorite style is, if you like big black titties, you gonna cream over dis movie. Trust! 5000, G!
tagline: Kick Ass Guarantee - No Fake Tits, No Condoms
title: Kick Ass Chicks 42: Big Black Titties
